Usage a melee free-hand weapon or a melee unarmed Strike

Tattooed fists, savage claws, or even powerful gauntlets—you swing each with the fury of an animal from the woods.

Immanence Strikes with your hands of the wildling deal an additional 1 spirit splash damage per weapon damage die. You are immune to this splash damage.

Transcendence—Feral Swing 1 (spirit, transcendence)

Effect You lash out with both arms, rending all before you. Each creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] must succeed at a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC or take spirit damage equal to your normal Strike damage with your hands of the wildling. You can choose to swing with abandon, which imposes a –2 circumstance bonus to enemies' saving throws, but causes you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of your next turn.
